titles.title: Do You See The Lamb, Bright As The Sun?

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Do you see the Lamb, bright as the sun?
Do you see the Lamb, many as one?
Do you see the Lamb, high on His throne? (2x.)
Do you see, do you see the Lamb?

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Yes, I see that Lamb, etc.
Will you be that Lamb, etc.
Yes, I'll be that Lamb, etc.
